com.soen.risk.validator

Class RiskMapValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.validator.RiskMapValidator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RiskMapValidatorTest

    public class RiskMapValidator
extends java.lang.Object

    Map File Validator

    This class is used to check for wrong syntax of map file, check for wrong syntax of territory, check for wrong syntax of continent, check for duplicate territory, check for duplicate continent, check for duplicate adjacent territory, check for missing continent, and check for connectivity of territory graph.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yogesh Nimbhorkar
